component.description: CFITSIO -- C and Fortran libraries for access to FITS files

abstract.p: The CFITSIO package is a series of C functions that provide easy access to FITS files on disk. It was written by William D. Pence of HEASARC (High Energy Astrophysics Science Archive Research Center) at the Goddard Space Flight Center, USA. Starlink is grateful to William Pence for giving his permission for CFITSIO to be released on Starlink.
